divs: Sighting DetailsI check updates often. I checked tonight and saw the report from Decker. It nearly exactly describes the sighting I had tonight. The same objects? Decker is about 15 miles south of my sighting. I would not have reported this sighting (rather short and mundane)except to confirm the Decker witness was not alone on seeing this aerial light display.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Gagetown
This sighting has never been favorited.
